Select * from project_info
project_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_no},'%')
AND project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_name},'%')
AND client_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{client_name},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(project_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{end_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
ORDER BY id DESC limit #{skip},#{take}

SELECT * from project_info
AND project_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_no},'%')
SELECT project_name from project_info WHERE project_no=#{project_no}
SELECT p.* from project_info p inner JOIN contract_info c on c.project_no=p.project_no where c.contract_no=#{contract_no}

Select * from project_info p
AND project_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_no},'%')
AND project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_name},'%')
order by id desc

select p.project_name,p.client_spec,c.contract_no,c.external_coating,c.internal_coating,CONCAT('Φ',c.od,'x',c.wt,'mm') as od_wt,count(pipe_no) as total_count,sum(p_length) as total_length,sum(weight) as total_weight from pipe_basic_info pb right join contract_info c on pb.contract_no=c.contract_no right join project_info p on c.project_no=p.project_no where p.project_no=#{project_no} GROUP BY c.external_coating,c.internal_coating

select max(operation_time) as max_time,min(operation_time) as min_time from inspection_process_record_header h LEFT join pipe_basic_info p on h.pipe_no=p.pipe_no left join contract_info c on p.contract_no=c.contract_no left join project_info pi on c.project_no=pi.project_no where pi.project_no=#{project_no}

SELECT d.max_value,d.min_value,d.item_name,d.unit_name_en, max(item.item_value) as max_record_value,min(item.item_value) as min_record_value from project_info p left join acceptance_criteria a on p.acceptance_criteria_no=a.acceptance_criteria_no left join dynamic_measurement_item d on a.acceptance_criteria_no=d.acceptance_criteria_no left join inspection_process_record_item item on item.item_code=d.item_code INNER join inspection_process_record_header header on item.inspection_process_record_header_code=header.inspection_process_record_header_code where p.project_no=#{project_no} and d.process_code not like '%lab%' and item.item_value is not null and header.result='1' and item.item_value<>'' GROUP BY d.process_code,d.item_code

SELECT d.max_value,d.min_value,d.item_name,d.unit_name_en, max(item.item_value) as max_record_value,min(item.item_value) as min_record_value from project_info p left join acceptance_criteria a on p.acceptance_criteria_no=a.acceptance_criteria_no left join dynamic_measurement_item d on a.acceptance_criteria_no=d.acceptance_criteria_no left join inspection_process_record_item item on item.item_code=d.item_code INNER join inspection_process_record_header header on item.inspection_process_record_header_code=header.inspection_process_record_header_code where p.project_no=#{project_no} and d.process_code like '%lab%' and item.item_value is not null and header.result='1' and item.item_value<>'' GROUP BY d.process_code,d.item_code
